duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversight of specific general ledger departments with a focus on accounts payable and supports the hotel controller.
Ensure accurate and timely processing of accounts payable transactions.
Conduct month-end close responsibilities for the designated general ledger accounts.
Assist with financial analysis and reporting.
Reconcile balance sheet accounts and prepare journal entries.
Contribute to the improvement of internal control processes and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
